original_text: For even thy brethren, and the house of thy father, even they have dealt treacherously with thee; yea, they have called a multitude after thee: believe them not, though they speak fair words unto thee.
korean_text: 네 형제와 아버지의 집이라도 너를 속이며 네 뒤에서 크게 외치나니 그들이 네게 좋은 말을 할지라도 너는 믿지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: and the house of thy father
even they have dealt treacherously with thee
yea, they have called a multitude after thee
sentences.korean_translation: 과연 그들이 너 뒤에 무리를 불렀느니라

sentences.original_text: though they speak fair words unto thee
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그들이 너에게 아름다운 말을 할지라도
